pageContext.claim: “Look at what happened with South Korea. don't forget, we helped South Korea -- we have spent trillions of dollars. Not billions, trillions of dollars over many, many years.”
pageContext.analysis: Actually, from 1953 to 1974, when grant assistance from the United States dwindled to a negligible amount, North Korea received about $4 billion of grant aid. The United States also provided loans with concessionary rates of interest but under no accounting does it add up to "trillions of dollars."
